comment.author: 15319761@N06
comment._content: This may be a member of the famous "14th Brooklyn" (14th New York State Militia / 84th New York Infantry) based on his uniform, which is fairly unique: www.theredleggeddevil.com/p/original-images.html

comment.author: 7487292@N04
comment._content: Good eye. This photo is believed to have been recently identified as a member of the 14th Brooklyn: www.npr.org/blogs/pictureshow/2012/04/17/150801239/photo-...
